Comment:
Hey sir üëã
Hope you‚Äôre doing well!

I‚Äôm Tapas, Founder & CEO of NScliq ‚Äî building India‚Äôs first fully integrated healthcare system.

Even today, patients struggle for basic access: ‚Ä¢ 10 Cr+ people visit private clinics daily, but there‚Äôs no unified system
‚Ä¢ Reports, tests, and appointments take days
‚Ä¢ Rural healthcare still confusing & under-connected
‚Ä¢ Emergency & surgery bookings are chaotic with zero transparency

NScliq connects clinics + doctors + diagnostics + pharmacy + ambulances + surgeries into one platform ‚Äî making healthcare fast, transparent & accessible anywhere.

Why I‚Äôm building this:
In 2022 I had a knee injury and had to visit 20+ clinics, waited months for MRI & surgery. That experience showed me how broken the system really is ‚Äî and became my mission.

Vision ‚Äì Pan-India rollout with rural-first approach
‚Äì Digital medical identity for every citizen
‚Äì Revenue: appointments, diagnostics, pharmacy, hospital partnerships & insurance

Ask Looking for the right mentor & early-stage investor to build this at scale.
If you‚Äôre open, I‚Äôd love 10 minutes to share the roadmap üôè

Thank you for your time, Tapas | Founder & CEO ‚Äì NScliq üìß tapassethi005@gmail.com
üìç India
